Producer: Zhi Jiang Liu, Penny Carl-Nelson, Pauline Chan, Lesley Stevens
Screenwriter: Martin Edmond, Pauline Chan, Philip Dalkin
Production Co: Zhejiang Hengdian Film Production, Portal Pictures
Synopsis: A Chinese orphan (Zhu Lin) meets her longtime Australian sponsor (Guy Pearce) and discovers that he leads a far less idyllic life than his postcards to her suggest.
Title: 33 Postcards
